column5: Starting my search for a jon boat, so I'm lookig at a list of manufactuers.  I've only seen Trackers and Lunds around, so I'm not sure if the others are sold.  Please let me know what companies are sold in Canada  Also, any feedback or experiences on these is appreciated.

There is also princecraft, sylvan, g3, polar craft, stanley, legend and im sure there is others. Not sure if they all sell jon boats though. I would recommend a lund or princecraft. Good luck with your search, kijiji is a good place to start, and you can also look at trader.ca, as well as forums all over the internet.

Lowe makes a jon boat...so does crestliner...BTW, Lowe = Crestliner & Crestliner = Lowe, same company same hull check around for the best price if shopping new. Another point, consider a modified jon rather than the regular flat bow. Or consider a regular hull boat for versatility.  Lowe boats

G3 makes a Jon Boat as well. In fact they make a bunch of different models and sizes to choose from in both riveted and welded. I don't think you will find a better selection from any manufacturer.  G3 Boats
